feed.title: ajbozdar.github.io
feed.subtitle: I am a software solutions developer. I code in C# and have fun in Ruby. I believe work speaks more than words. See my Github for more or go to projects page. <3

entry.title: Fast Websites
entry.content: In past, I created many personal websites but all were gone. I hope this will stay here for longer. Thank you very much for your visit. You may be able to see them via archive.org.
